document.docAuthor: Olmi, Massimo, Copeland, Robert S. & Noort, Simon Van
document.masterDocTitle: Dryinidae of the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Dryinidae of the Afrotropical region (Hymenoptera, Chrysidoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: ♂ . Fully winged; body length 1.6–2.1 mm . Head black; antenna brown; mesosoma and metasoma black; legs brown, except stalks of femora, protibia and tarsi whitish (except brown last tarsomere). Antenna filiform; antennomeres in following proportions: 4:3.5:6:6:5:5.5:5:5:5:7.5; antennomere 3 less than 3 × as long as broad (6:2.5). Head dull, granulate and slightly rugose; frontal line absent; occipital carina absent; POL = 5.5; OL = 2; OOL = 4; greatest breadth of lateral ocelli slightly longer than OL (2.5:2); area between lateral ocelli and eyes flat and rugose. Palpal formula 5/2. Mesoscutum dull, granulate. Notauli complete, posteriorly separated; minimum distance between notauli as long as greatest breadth of lateral ocelli. Mesoscutellum slightly granulate. Metanotum shiny, unsculptured. Metapectal-propodeal disc shiny, unsculptured, without furrows or keels. Forewing hyaline, without dark transverse bands. Dorsal process of paramere ( Fig. 220E ) long and slender. Tibial spurs 1/1/2.

caption.paragraph: FIGURE 228. Habitus of Gonatopus species. A: G. martellii Olmi, ♀ holotype in dorsal view. B: G. minutus Olmi, Copeland & van Noort sp. nov.: ♀ holotype in dorsal (B) view; head and mesosoma sculpture. Scale bar: A: 1.99 mm.

FIGURE 229. Gonatopus species. A: G. leptothorax Ceballos: ♀ from Lesotho, Mamathes, habitus in dorsal view. B: G. lon- giusculus Olmi, ♀ holotype: mesoscutum + mesoscutellum + metapectal-propodeal disc + propodeal declivity in dorsal view. C: G. luteipes (Benoit), ♀ holotype: head in frontal view. D, E: G. maritimus Olmi, ♀ holotype: mesoscutum + mesoscutellum + metapectal-propodeal disc + propodeal declivity in dorsal view (D); mesosoma in lateral view (E). F: G. incognitus Olmi, ♀ holotype: head in frontal view. G: G. masoalensis Olmi, ♀ holotype: mesosoma in lateral view. Scale bar: A: 1.73 mm; B: 1.01 mm; C: 0.15 mm; D: 0.53 mm; E: 0.80 mm; F: 0.28 mm; G: 0.98 mm.
